div.p: Description:A mandate, obligation, requirement, rule, or expectation unilaterally imposed by an organization on:

li.p: The manner in which an act is executed

div.p: Examples:A clinical or research protocols imposed by a payer, a malpractice insurer, or an institution to which a provider must adhere. A mandate imposed by a denominational institution for a provider to provide or withhold certain information from the patient about treatment options.
